comments.body: I'd check with @tannerlinsley, the docs say that this is required, but it's clear from the examples that it's sometimes optional.

I think it is required.  From the code, I don't see anything like defaults being provided, I'd rather be strict on it.  [Step size is definitely required](https://github.com/tannerlinsley/react-ranger/blob/master/src/index.js#L79-L83)

Steps are required, stepSize is only required if steps aren't defined.  See: https://github.com/tannerlinsley/react-ranger/blob/master/examples/custom-steps/src/index.js#L9-L15

At least that's my reading of it.
